note: Writer of 'Ghost Town, A Liverpool Shadowplay', shortlisted for Costa, long listed for Portico Prize. Essayist, Scriptwriter for Radio & Stage. Former TV scriptwriter. Collaborator with artists, sculptors and musicians on installations, sound art and performance projects in places such as submarine dock, derelict townhouse, power station, cobblers shop, boating lake. Collagist, assemblage maker. Currently writing 'Wild Twin', the follow up to 'Ghost Town' and 'Deliria' for Rough Trade Books.
